ValidationRule.description: This rule ensures all of the following information is entered in order to be able to save a Case when Status = “Working”: 1) Contact Name, 2) Subject
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(OR(ISPICKVAL(Status,'NS_Working'), ISPICKVAL(Status,'NS_Escalated'), ISPICKVAL(Status,'NS_AwaitingResponse'), ISPICKVAL(Status,'NS_Closed')), ISBLANK(Contact.Id), PRIORVALUE(NS_RecordTypeName__c) <> 'Email-to-Case')
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please populate the Contact Name field prior to saving the Case.
